name: tomitribe.io-static
description: The tomitribe.io website builder and static renderer

scripts.build:webapp: npm ci --prefix generation && npm run build --prefix generation
scripts.build:static: npm ci --prefix renderer && npm run build --prefix renderer
scripts.serve:webapp: npm ci --prefix renderer && npm run serve-webapp --prefix renderer
scripts.serve:static: npm ci --prefix renderer && npm run serve-static --prefix renderer
scripts.push:gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix static origin gh-pages

author: Tomitribe <contact@tomitribe.com>
